name: Draconian
description:
Journey Begins!

In the night of a beautiful day, the City of Dawnbird has conquered. A young warrior Arsanas' life was ruined that terrible night. Now he must go on a long journey. Throughout the journey, he will go through the wildlands, caves, dungeons, and face epic bosses.

                                                                                                                           

Upgrade Your Skills To Improve Your Combat Abilities

You'll have several skills to learn and improve through the journey.

                                                                                                                        

Show No Mercy!

Defeat your enemies with the hand-crafted brutal execution animations!

                                                                                                                       

Other Features

Draconian is designed for mobile devices. You can play it on your mobile phone.

Retro pixel art graphics and handcrafted animations. 

4 different regions with various enemies. 

5 epic bosses. 

Story-driven gameplay experience.

An epic fantasy world with an epic main story and many side stories. 

Secret chests in very secret corners waiting to be found.

                                                                                                                    

There will be Windows and iOS versions in the future. For now, the game is only available in Google Play Store.

Witness the Adventure!
